name: Ext_R2_SupplyRequest_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.SupplyRequest.reason[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents SupplyRequest.reason[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SupplyRequest|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Why the supply item was requested
element.definition: `SupplyRequest.reason[x]` maps to R4 `SupplyRequest.reasonCode`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource)` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo. `SupplyRequest.reason[x]` maps to R4 `SupplyRequest.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.

element.short: Why the supply item was requested
